saladList.name: Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad
saladList.description: Classic Caesar salad with grilled chicken, crisp romaine lettuce, and Caesar dressing.

saladList.name: Shrimp Avocado Salad
saladList.description: Fresh salad with succulent shrimp, avocado, cherry tomatoes, and a zesty lime dressing.

saladList.name: Cobb Salad with Bacon and Eggs
saladList.description: Hearty Cobb salad featuring bacon, hard-boiled eggs, grilled chicken, and blue cheese.

saladList.name: Salmon Nicoise Salad
saladList.description: A flavorful Nicoise salad with grilled salmon, potatoes, green beans, and olives.

saladList.name: Thai Beef Salad
saladList.description: Spicy and tangy Thai-inspired salad with grilled beef, fresh vegetables, and lime dressing.

saladList.name: Caprese Salad
saladList.description: Classic Italian salad with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, basil, and balsamic glaze.

saladList.name: Greek Salad
saladList.description: Refreshing Greek salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, feta, and Greek dressing.

saladList.name: Quinoa and Roasted Vegetable Salad
saladList.description: Nutritious salad with quinoa, roasted vegetables, chickpeas, and lemon-tahini dressing.

saladList.name: Mango Avocado Spinach Salad
saladList.description: Vibrant spinach salad with ripe mango, avocado, red onion, and a citrus vinaigrette.

saladList.name: Couscous and Chickpea Salad
saladList.description: Mediterranean-inspired salad with couscous, chickpeas, tomatoes, and feta.
